Posts.Content: omg moonwalker! u just saidwhat i've been too scared to say!just earlier 2nite my dh &i said we'll see the reumo.,maybe some of this hand pain is from arthritis.i had it before taxotere,but not like this, complicated with neuropathy..u gave me a little hope i can do something.  on the other front i have an appt. with the cardio. 2mmorrow,about tomoxifen. im tellibg him no0 thank u; ive had 3 strokes already!!your post was surely timely 4 me thsank u so much for sharing."when the student is eeady,the teacher will appear".sending light and love,  cherie
Posts.Title: Chemo induced arthritis and AI pains

Posts.Title: Chemo induced arthritis and AI pains

Posts.Content: oh honey,i am so sorry for your pain.i did not have that dire a situation; but,it's been 11 months from surgery,chemo done etc.,now ther's a lull,thete's Really a lull. We have seen a thertapist,during my chemo,and it helped a bit. we spend a lot of time physically,but he sleeps..i'm supposed to be patient, but it makes me so sad..they said he has pstd fromk MY cancer..i have 2 remember he was on the rollercoaster,too. can u get him to talk about it all?would he open, or getmad if u put down in wrioting what you want from him, how ur feeling..for me,i'm afraid a lot..what if wer'e wasting the very time i fought so hard to get/i'm in ur corner.  when u need a shoulder,i'm herte.  someone who understands.  cherie
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer and Marriage

Posts.Content: i cant tell u what long term effects r. sorry .    I have multiple sclerosis. so far all thre new meds. causen too many side effects..lousy immune system even before b.c. trying tamoxifen next. w3ish me kuck..im running out of options. hope ur heart will be o.k.     i am getting so tired of hearing "what doesnt kill us makes us stronger.". more options please..
